title: 01/01/21 - HOUR 1 - Alabama And Everyone Else, The Greatness Of Trevor Lawrence, Albert Breer
itunes:title: 01/01/21 - HOUR 1 - Alabama And Everyone Else, The Greatness Of Trevor Lawrence, Albert Breer
description:
In Hour 1 of The Herd with Colin Cowherd, it's Alabama and then everyone else in the SEC as far as Colin is concerned--with Notre Dame facing the everlasting supreme team in the College Football Playoff semifinal. Also, Colin argues for GOAT status for one college football quarterback. Finally, senior NFL reporter Albert Breer of Sports Illustrated's MMQB joins the program to discuss the critical Week 17 in the NFL.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
